msbt.message: Yaaay, welcome back! I haven't seen you in <50_8 x="0" y="2" a="years" b="year" c="years" />!I tell ya You went away and I got so bored. It's almost like nothing happened around here!

YAAAY! Look! It's been <50_8 x="0" y="2" a="years" b="year" c="years" /> and <50_8 x="0" y="1" a="months" b="month" c="months" />, but my snack buddy, , IS BACK!I never forgot you! I've even saved snacks for us to eat together! Some are stale, but we can still eat 'em!

?! WOW! Welcome back! This is just like the bugs said!<10_9 />Last night the bugs in my house said you were coming back. They told me to buy snacks.I thought they just wanted snacks, and I wanted snacks too, so <10_5 />That doesn't matter! BecauseYOU'RE BACK!

Excuse me! Have you seen someone named ?Huh? YOU'RE ? You two have the same name!I'm just kidding. I know you're both the same person.You gotta stay! Show your face around here more often. I miss my snack buddy!You are THAT aren't you, ?
Hey, it's ! I haven't seen you in a long time!I'm still the same ol' me. I know for sure because I wrote my name in ALL of my underwear!
! Where have you been? I feel like it's been a whileI saved a snack to eat with you, but then I forgot which pocket it was in and I sat on it.I'll get another one, and we can eat that one together, !
Huh? There you are! !Man! Where have you been? You can't just disappear without saying anything!I MISSED YOU SO MUCH!

! Where have you BEEN? I haven't talked to you in, like, over <50_8 x="0" y="1" a="months" b="month" c="months" />!Huh? You've been around? What do you mean? Were we Were we playing hide-and-seek?!Please don't disappear on me! I'll cry if my snack buddy goes away again, !
Can yousee me?I thought maybe I was a ghost for the last <50_8 x="0" y="1" a="months" b="month" c="months" />!I'm always watching you, but you ignore me, !That's no way to treat a snack buddy.

! Long time no see! How long has it been? <50_8 x="0" y="1" a="months" b="month" c="months" />?Huh? What do you mean, you've "been around"? That's weirdOh, I understand! You've been playing while I've been sleeping! You could've just woke me up!
